forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High 12C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 53F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy. Low 3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Low 37F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early. A few showers developing later in the day. High 12C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with a few showers later in the day. High 53F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 7C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low near 45F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 14C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 57F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low near 10C. Winds SE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low around 50F. Winds SE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 3C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 38F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers. High near 10C. E winds shifting to NNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers. High 49F. E winds shifting to NNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 37F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High around 10C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High around 50F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 34F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High around 10C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High near 50F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally fair. Low 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear skies. Low 37F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 52F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 7C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 44F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 11C. SSE winds shifting to WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 52F. SSE winds shifting to WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional light rain. Low 6C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light rain. Low 43F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of light rain. High 11C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light rain. High 51F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 4C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low around 40F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
